title: quickfind r.i.p ?
body: I can't use quickfind. What happened to the sever? It said Riot Games did not respond in time.

replies.body: What do you mean by quick find?  I'm guessing this is happening in champion select?  Let me know with some more details, and I'll try to help!
he's talking about https://quickfind.kassad.in/ a site like lolking where you serach for summoner's names.
Ya, this is what i mean and talk about, the search summoner's name's function had been down
Been down for me for at least a few days.   Sucks cause I use it every single game I play

He means probably the summoner search on the website http://quickfind.kassad.in/

This problem has been happening intermittently for the past 2 weeks, sometimes it works, sometimes we get this error. 

Today it seems to be completely down.
